alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Shelby and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hoover Metropolitan Stadium to Pelham to near Alabaster. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Homewood, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Helena, Chelsea, Indian Springs Village, Westover, Oak Mountain State Park, Oak Mountain Amphitheater, Greystone, Inverness, Highland Lakes, Cahaba Heights, Riverchase, Patton Creek, Fowler Lake and Hoover Metropolitan Stadium. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
